title: Education
desc: I'm on fourth year of my Engineer's degree in Computer Science, specjalizing in Information systems engineering. As part of my specialization, I have developed strong skills in creating and interpreting business documentation and notation, including UML diagrams, BPMN models, and other analytical tools. I have also gained experience in designing and managing data warehouses, focusing on structuring, optimizing, and maintaining complex data environments to support business intelligence and analytics. Additionally, I possess a solid foundation in programming and web development, which allows me to better understand and bridge the gap between technical and business requirements.
